result.execSummary:
The defendant Shaquile O Slater was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. On one or more other charges, Shaquile O Slater was found not guilty. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Shaquile O Slater is presumed innocent of the not guilty charges.

  • Shaquile O Slater was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Clarification of December 16, 2015 Jury Trial Verdict is as follows:

COUNT 1 on case 14CF1534 NOT GUILTY
COUNT 2 on case 14CF1534 GUILTY
COUNT 3 on case 14CF1534 GUILTY with the additional answer to question put forth in COUNT 3 is NO
COUNT 4 on case 14CF1534 NOT GUILTY

Judgement of Acquittal on COUNT 1 and COUNT 4
Judgement of Conviction on COUNT 2 and COUNT 3

Defendant Shaquile O Slater in court with attorney Eric M. Hailstock.  Defendant Shaquile O Slater in custody.  Zachary A Wittchow appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Statements made as to sentencing.  

AS TO COUNT 3: Court orders the defendant to serve 90 days in the House of correction (CONCURRENT TO SENTENCE IMPOSED IN COUNTS 1 & 2 OF 15CF310), with 90 days credit (TIME SERVED).  

Court ordered defendant to pay all applicable court costs and surcharges.  
Defendant shall provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank and pay all appropriate costs.
Court orders all costs and surcharges to be paid during the 3 year probationary period imposed in 15CF310.  Any unpaid portion to convert to a civil judgment.   
**Court approves credit subject to defense counsel filing credit form with the Clerk of Courts.**

Attorney Eric M. Hailstock in court, defendant Shaquile O Slater not in court, in custody.  Zachary A Wittchow appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Matter is scheduled for sentencing hearing today.  Court is currently in trial and unable to conduct hearing today.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for January 28, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Exhibits received and inventoried this date.  
D282
cf
Stipulation and Order for Return/Destruction of Exhibits, signed and filed.

Attorney Eric M. Hailstock in court, defendant Shaquile O Slater not in court, in custody.  Zachary A Wittchow appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jury submitted questions.  Court addresses questions on the record and a response sent back to jury.    At the hour of 4:00 p.m the jury returned and, by their foreperson, brought in a verdict of NOT GUILTY on COUNT 1; NOT GUILTY on COUNT 2; GUILTY on COUNT 3 - with the additional answer to question put forth in COUNT 3 and NO; NOT GUILTY on COUNT 4; GUILTY on COUNT 5 (15CF310); GUILTY on COUNT 6 (15CF310) which was then read.  Court polled and discharged the jury.  Verdict received and filed.  Court granted state's motion for judgment on the verdict and denied defense motion for judgment not withstanding the verdict on COUNT 3, COUNT 5 and COUNT 6; Judgement of Acquittal on COUNT 1, COUNT 2 and COUNT 4.  Court ordered entry of judgment of conviction on COUNT 3 but penalty enhancer is DISMISSED, COUNT 5 and COUNT 6.  Matter adjourned for Sentencing. Defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Sheriff's Department pending sentencing.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for January 7, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Shaquile O Slater in court with attorney Eric M. Hailstock.  Defendant Shaquile O Slater in custody.  Zachary A Wittchow appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court finds upon questioning, the defendant knowingly, intelligently and voluntarily waived right to testify.  Court makes record re: juror #22.  Trial to proceed.  Jury in the box at 9:50am.  Sworn for defense: Sheila K.  Defense rests.  Sworn for state as rebuttal witness: MPD Officer Joseph Sanchez.  State and defense rest.  Testimony closed.  Court instructed jury.  Closing arguments by state and defense.  Court charged the jury.  Jury retired at the hour of 12:05pm to deliberate in the charge of Sheriff's Deputies Walls and Dukat who were duly sworn for that purpose.  Court stands in recess for the lunch hour.

Defendant Shaquile O Slater in court with attorney Eric M. Hailstock.  Defendant Shaquile O Slater in custody.  Zachary A Wittchow appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jury in the box at 9:06am.  Thirteen (13) good and lawful citizens of the County of Milwaukee, WI qualified to serve as jurors in the above entitled cause were duly sworn.  Court instructed jury.  Opening statements by state and defense.  Trial proceeds.  Sworn for the state: Marvin M., MPD Officer Cassandra Benitez, MPD Sergeant Timothy Gauerke, MPD Officer Joseph Sanchez, MPD Officer Dominique Heaggan-Brown.  Exhibits 1-16 received.  Court stands in recess for the lunch hour.  Trial to resume at 2:00pm. 

Trial continues.  Sworn for the State: MPD Robert Welch, MPD Officer Vincent Woller, VA Police Officer Adam Dettman, MPD Officer Troy Mason, VA Police Officer Adam Dettman, MPD Detective Troy Mason, MPD Detective Edward McCrary, MPD Officer Dionte King, Analyst Jeff Zwickey.  Exhibits 17-22 received.  State rests subject to rebuttal.  Jury out of box.  Defense motion for directed verdict at close of state's case denied by the court.  Jury released at 4:15pm. Trial to resume on 12/16/15 at 9:00am in Br. 35.

Same appearances.  Jury panel in Court.  Replacement (Juror #22) sworn.  Voir dire proceeds  Thirteen (13) good and lawful citizens of the County of Milwaukee, WI qualified to serve as jurors in the above entitled cause were duly impanelled.  Jury is released for the evening at 4:58pm.  Court stands in recess, matter to resume on 12/15/15 at 9:00am in Br. 35. 

Filed, (Amended) jury list

Defendant Shaquile O Slater in court with attorney Eric M. Hailstock.  Defendant Shaquile O Slater in custody.  Zachary A Wittchow for Antonella Aleman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Matter is scheduled for jury trial with #15CF310.  Court holds conference with counsel in chambers off the record.  Matter is called on the record.  Court passes case. 

Case continues on the record.  Matter will proceed to trial today.  Court orders witnesses sequestered.  Jury panel in court.  Voir dire proceeds at the hour of 11:43pm.  Court releases panel, Court stands in recess for the lunch hour.
Filed, jury list

Defendant Shaquile O Slater in court with attorney Eric M. Hailstock.  Defendant Shaquile O Slater in custody.  Nathaniel E Adamson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court holds conference with counsel in chambers, matter is called on the record with defendant present.  State places offer on the record.  Matter remains in trial posture, matter remains scheduled for jury trial on 12/16/15 at 9:30am in br. 35.

Defendant Shaquile O Slater in court with attorney Eric M. Hailstock.  Defendant Shaquile O Slater in custody.  Hanna Kolberg for Antonella Aleman appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court hears argument re: defense request to lower bail. Court DENIES request to amend bail.  Final pre-trial scheduled for November 6, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for December 14, 2015 at 09:30 am.

*NO FILE IN COURT*
Defendant Shaquile O Slater in court with attorney Eric M. Hailstock.  Defendant Shaquile O Slater in custody.  Antonella Aleman appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Matter is in Court for warrant return on this case and #15CF310, case called on the record. Court orders warrant withdrawn. Counsel was recently retained. Counsel requests to be heard as to bail. Court sets bail at $1500 cash with turn over to Justice Point with the same terms and conditions. Matter is adjourned for motion hearing and status conference.
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 1500.00.
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.

Attorney Edward Lee Wright in court.  Antonella Aleman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
NO COURT FILE. Defendant has not had contact with Justice Point  (15CF310) or his attorney. Trial date is vacated.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.   Court ordered defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.    Motion of the defense counsel to withdraw granted by the Court.

Defendant Shaquile O Slater in court with attorney Edward Lee Wright.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court ordered case adjourned for jury trial in Branch 7.  Jury trial scheduled for 09-09-2015 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Shaquile O Slater in court with attorney Edward Lee Wright.  Hanna Ritchie Kolberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court grants state's motion.  Case will remain calendared for trial.

Defendant Shaquile O Slater in court with attorney Edward Lee Wright.  Hanna Ritchie Kolberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court is in trial. Case adjourned for a decision.  Decision scheduled for 04-15-2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Shaquile O Slater in court with attorney Edward Lee Wright.  Hanna Ritchie Kolberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case adjourned for a decision.  Decision scheduled for 04-14-2015 at 08:30 am.
Against Joinder.

Defendant Shaquile O Slater in court with attorney Edward Lee Wright.  Hanna Ritchie Kolberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case will remain calendared.

Defendant Shaquile O Slater in court with attorney Edward Lee Wright.  Hanna Ritchie Kolberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 7.  Status conference scheduled for 03-16-2015 at 09:30 am.
State's Motion for Joinder.
Final pre-trial on March 5, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Parties are being notified that effective December 1, 2014 this case will be assigned to Judge Thomas McAdams, Branch 7, in Room 629 of the Courthouse.

Defendant Shaquile O Slater in court with attorney Edward Lee Wright.  Hanna R. Kolberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case heard off the record as Defense counsel is in a Jury Trial on another case in another court room. Case is scheduled for Jury Trial. Court orders case adjourned for Final Pretrial on 3-5-2015 at 8:30 a.m., and Jury Trial on 3-18-2015 at 9:00 a.m., Br. 17.  Final pre-trial scheduled for March 5, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for March 18, 2015 at 09:00 am.
State's Requested Jury Instructions and State's Motion in Limine, received and filed.

Defendant Shaquile O Slater in court with attorney Edward Lee Wright.  Nicole Sheldon for Hanna R. Kolberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Final Pretrial proceeds. Case remains calendared for Jury Trial on 11-5-2014 at 9:00 a.m., Br. 17.
State's Witness List and List of Witnesses Whom the State Will Offer In Rebuttal to the Defendant's Alibi, receive dand filed.
Defendant's Proposed Jury Instructions, Defendant's Motion in Limine, and Defendant's Notice of Alibi, received and filed.

Defendant Shaquile O Slater in court with attorney Edward Lee Wright.  Marissa L. Santiago appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defense requests case be set for Final Pretrial and Jury Trial.   Defense counsel has received discovery and offer.  Felony Pretrial Scheduling Order filed.  Copies given to state and defense counsel.  Case is adjourned for Final Pretrial Conference on 10-23-2014 at 8:30 a.m. and Jury Trial on 11-5-2014 at 9:00 a.m., Br. 17.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 23, 2014 at 08:30 am.  Final pre-trial scheduled for November 5, 2014 at 09:00 am.

Request for Substitution of Judge received and filed.  Court consented to substitution against Judge Siefert.  Parties are advised the Clerk of Circuit Court reassigned case pursuant to current court rules to Judge Stark, Br. 17. Case calendared for STATUS on 8/19/2014 at 8:30 am.

Defendant Shaquile O Slater in court with attorney Edward Lee Wright.  Marissa L. Santiago appeared for the State of Wisconsin./ SAB
Defense has not received an offer yet.   Parties advised effective August 2, 2014, this case will be reassigned to Judge Siefert, Branch 47, Room 629 of the Courthouse.

Defendant Shaquile O Slater in court with attorney Edward L Wright.  Kevin Shomin for Danielle E Chojnacki appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge JD Watts, Branch 15.    Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty.  Scheduling conference scheduled for July 21, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered no possession or use of no dangerous weapons or firearms.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with M.L.M. (4/13/98).

Defendant Shaquile O Slater in court with attorney Edward L Wright.  Thomas L Potter appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Watts, Branch 15. Defense enters a plea of not guilty to counts 3 & 4.
Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 13, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 6/3/2014 at 1:30pm
